## GitDocumentDB.saveAuthor() method

Save current author to .git/config

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
saveAuthor(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

Save GitDocumentDB\#author. to user.name and user.email in .git/config
